You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 6.2× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.

You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is PARROT.
